parts.title: Welcome to your novel
parts.introduction_1: By opening wortomat you made the first step towards writing your novel! ✊
parts.content_1: This is the 'parts' view. This is where your actual writing is done. Parts group multiple chapters together.
parts.content_2: Let's get started! Use the + button in the menu on the bottom left to create a new part.

chapters.title: Creating chapters
chapters.introduction_1: Create a new chapter by clicking the '+' button next to a part name.
chapters.content_1: By the way: To change a part's name, click on its name.

research_groups.title: The Research view
research_groups.introduction_1: By opening wortomat you made the first step towards writing your novel! ✊
research_groups.content_1: This is the 'research' view. Put here anything that you need to look into - historical events, some technology background or whatever you need.
research_groups.content_2: You haven't created any research groups yet. Use the + button in the menu on the bottom left to create one.

research.title: Creating research items
research.introduction_1: Create a new research item by clicking the '+' button next to a research group's name.
research.content_1: By the way: To change a group's name, click on its name.

characters.title: Creating characters
characters.introduction_1: Create a new character by clicking the '+' button next to a character group's name.
characters.content_1: By the way: To change a group's name, click on its name.

character_groups.title: Where your characters come to life
character_groups.introduction_1: Reliable characters are the key to a successful novel. Make sure to invest some time to get to know them.
character_groups.content_1: What is their motivation? Are they shy, are they ambitious?
character_groups.content_2: Create a new character group by clicking the '+' button in the menu on the bottom left.

locations.title: Creating locations
locations.introduction_1: No matter where your story takes place - if you write Science Fiction or a Thriller. Having a detailed overview over your locations will help you to describe them more atmospheric to your readers!
locations.content_1: Create a new location by clicking the '+' button in the menu on the bottom left.

location_groups.title: Where will your novel takes us?
location_groups.introduction_1: No matter where your story takes place - if you write Science Fiction or a Thriller. Having a detailed overview over your locations will help you to describe them more atmospheric to your readers!
location_groups.content_1: Create a new location group by clicking the '+' button in the menu on the bottom left.
